name: Professional Resume
description: Create a professional resume in minutes with Notion.

rawData.description: Create a professional resume in minutes with Notion.

enhancedContent.overview: A streamlined Notion-based resume builder designed to help job seekers craft compelling professional resumes quickly and efficiently. This template eliminates the complexity of traditional resume formatting while ensuring a polished, ATS-friendly output that stands out to employers.
problemsSolved: Spending hours struggling with complex formatting in traditional word processors
Creating generic resumes that don't highlight unique value propositions
Managing multiple resume versions for different job applications
solutionsBenefits: Rapid resume creation with professional formatting handled automatically
Structured approach ensures all critical information is included and well-organized
Easy customization and version control for targeting specific opportunities
idealFor: Job seekers looking to modernize their resume creation process
Recent graduates entering the professional workforce
Career changers needing to restructure their professional narrative
notRecommendedFor: Users requiring highly specialized industry formats (medical CV, academic curriculum vitae)
Those preferring traditional desktop publishing software workflows
whatsIncluded: Complete resume template with standard professional sections
Formatting guidelines and best practices documentation
Sample content examples for various career levels

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable within Notion. You can modify sections, adjust formatting, and add or remove elements to match your needs.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion account. However, Notion AI can help enhance your content writing if you have access to it.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very straightforward - simply duplicate the template and start filling in your information. Setup takes less than 5 minutes.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template follows current resume best practices and modern formatting standards that are effective for today's job market.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes built-in guidance and examples. For additional support, most creators provide email assistance or community forums.
